awards.title: Second place in the EAGE Earth-Hack Hackaton
awards.summary: The EAGE Earth-Hack Hackathon, a two and a half day event will be held in Kuala Lumpur on 22nd â€“ 24th February 2019, where software developers, engineers and geoscientists will spend intensive hours to hack, test and experiment with the latest advancements in machine learning algorithms against subsurface data such as seismic, logs, cores, to solve data mining, geological interpretation, and quantitative reservoir characterization problems.
